originalText.text:
My deepest gratitude goes to Lambda Legal - Western Regional Office for their unwavering dedication to justice and equality within the LGBTQ+ community. Engaging with this organization has been a transformative experience, showcasing their profound commitment to fighting for the rights and dignity of every individual.

Lambda Legal's Western Regional Office stands as a beacon of hope, providing legal expertise and advocacy that has a tangible impact on the lives of countless individuals. Their tireless efforts in challenging discriminatory practices and policies demonstrate a commitment to creating a more just and inclusive society.

What sets Lambda Legal apart is not just their legal expertise but the genuine care and empathy demonstrated by their team. Each interaction is marked by a deep understanding of the challenges faced by the LGBTQ+ community, fostering an environment where every individual feels heard and supported.

Participating in Lambda Legal events and initiatives has not only expanded my knowledge of legal issues but has also connected me with a community of resilient individuals dedicated to making a positive impact. My gratitude for Lambda Legal - Western Regional Office knows no bounds, and I wholeheartedly commend this organization to anyone seeking legal support and advocacy within the LGBTQ+ community. In supporting Lambda Legal, you're supporting a force for positive change and justice.

originalText.text:
Other people may have had great experiences with Lambda Legal, I did not. This happened a few years ago.

After reaching out to them about my traumatizing and horrific experience at NY Presbyterian in White Plains, NY, they for some odd reason connected me with their legal team in Californa who were not able to help me, duh! Like seriously, what were they thinking? All in all, they were a complete dead end. Very disappointing considering how highly regarded they are.

originalText.text: 3 phone calls...2 emails and no response.  I'm trying to get help for my senior Cancer survivor who is having serious issues with the MGMT agency that didn't help him to a point my friend had to break the lease.  SHAMEFUL !!!
